# Documentation PR

## Branch & Naming Verification
- [ ] Branch follows pattern: `doc/<section>/<kebab-feature>`
- [ ] All commits follow style: `doc (<section>): <message>`
- [ ] Changes pushed to GitHub after each discrete change
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated in **Added** or **Changed** section

**Section**: <!-- e.g., docs, api, config, server -->
